nodeList.altText:
Your Ballista will receive your ailment chance, ailment duration, and ailment effect.
If you have 100% chance to bleed on hit, 15% ailment stat ratio would give your Ballista 15% chance to bleed on hit.
nodeList.description: Your ailment modifiers also apply to your Ballista, but at a reduced ratio.
